amendment.description: To include certain former nuclear weapons program workers in the Special Exposure Cohort under the Energy Employees Occupational Illness Compensation Program and to provide for the disposal of certain excess Department of Defense stocks for funds for that purpose.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3384 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3384 proposed by Senator Bond. (consideration: CR S6913, S6966-6968; text: CR S6966-6967; text as modified: CR S6967-6968) To include certain former nuclear weapons program workers in the Special Exposure Cohort under the Energy Employees Occupational Illness Compensation Program and to provide for the disposal of certain excess Department of Defense stocks for funds for that purpose.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3384 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3384 proposed by Senator Bond.
